api_list.name: /Store/
api_list.description: Creates a Store associated to the account specified by the 'account_id' parameter. If you don't have the Account you need to call before the 'create merchant' API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hello-openapi.p.rapidapi.com/Store/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hello-openapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: sendStorePromotionTest
api_list.description: Send the Promotion to a test email

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the Movylo store where to create the Promotion

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: email address to send the test to

api_list.name: sendLoyaltyCards

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: email address to send the loyalty cards to

api_list.name: sendStorePromotion
api_list.description: Send the Promotion via the specified channels

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the Movylo store where to create the Promotion

required_parameters.name: store_id

api_list.name: setCustomer
api_list.description: Insert a new customer in a store. It looks for existing customer by phone and/or email and if it exists it will update it.

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the Movylo store where to search the customers

api_list.name: setMerchant
api_list.description:
Call this API to obtain the `account_id` that you need for the `create store` API
  1. item one
  2. item two
    • sublist
    • sublist
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hello-openapi.p.rapidapi.com/Merchant/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hello-openapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
